name: Remix Icons 2.5.0 - Line & Fill
description:
Last updated on May 1, 2021


------------------------------------------------------------


Remix Icons is a set of open-source neutral-style system symbols elaborately crafted for designers and developers.


All of the icons are free for both personal and commercial use.


The icons are created into 24x24px components and separated into Line & Fill style so it's easier to find whatever icon is needed.


Official Website: https://remixicon.com/

GitHub: https://github.com/Remix-Design/remixicon


-----------------------------------------------------------


V1.2 -> What changed? (May 1, 2021)

Removed from the library the local Text Styles & Color Styles, by adding “.” before style’s name. i.e Text Styles ‘Headline’ is now “.Headline” and by doing so, all text style under that grouping, are now unpublished.



V1.1 -> What changed? (Nov 17 2020)

Renamed Outlined to Line and Filled to Fill

i.e remix-icons/outlined/buildings/store-line -> remix-icons/line/buildings/store-line
